name: nypl-cloudwatch-alarm-mailer
description: Subscribes to SNS messages (from alarms), gets relevant log lines, emails them.

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel index.js --out-dir dist
scripts.deploy-qa: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e qa -f ./config/qa.env --handler dist/index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::224280085904:role/lambda_basic_execution --profile nypl-sandbox

author: The New York Public Library
